snippet: Credits and deductions can help a taxpayer meet the costs of continuing education. Eligibility depends on income, how tuition is paid and the type of student.
abstract: Tax credits and deductions can help taxpayers meet costs of continuing education; eligibility depends on income, how tuition is paid and  type of student; available credits and deductions and how they work described.
lead_paragraph: Credits and deductions can help a taxpayer meet the costs of continuing education. Eligibility depends on income, how tuition is paid and the type of student.

headline.seo: Tax Code Helps Continuing Education Students With Costs
headline.main: Those Returning to School Can Find Help in the Tax Code
headline.print_headline: Those Returning to School Can Find Help in the Tax Code
